Reviews.Title: “Lakefront experience!”
Reviews.Author: Travordon
Reviews.Content: First let me say Lakeshore is not luxury accommodations. However, if you are looking for Lake Taneycomo fun it is here! We have come here for several years to fish and hang out in Branson. The lakefront is cooler than in town by about 5-10 degrees. The trout fishing is generally pretty good off the 2 docks that Lakeshore has. If you need to dock a boat you can do that here as well. Rodney the owner/manager will help you out with most any info or needs you have. He even loaned our granddaughter a book when she finished hers! The pool is nice and offers some shade. This is a great location to stay at. Near enough to Branson to get there pretty quickly and handy to alot of other needs. My family will continue to use Lakeshore Resorts whenever we come to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Not the place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: Kwag6969
Reviews.Content: The appeal of the place is good, it has a very good location and the facilities have the potential to be great but.... when we first arrived the cabin was not clean and it smelled terrible. Upon further inspection, the shower was dirty and someone had broken a dish over one of the burners on the stove and the glass was not picked up. The stove itself was dirty and smoked like mad when we tried to use it to keep our dinner warm. Also the docks were only held to shore buy 1 bolt. When we tried to talk to the manager, he was not available. We were told that he would not be out of bed until 11:00am. So the matter was discussed with, as far as we could tell, the only other person "working" at the resort “Heidi” the psycho maid. She was totally unprofessional about it and even though we attempted to voice our dissatisfaction with the room in a calm manner, she became very emotional. After we were able to speak to the manager, the woman came back to our cabin and told my 78 year old father that thanks to us, she had been fired and now would be homeless. We were moved into a bigger and much better cabin and all seemed to be going much better. All of this took placed on a Friday night and a Saturday morning. The woman was still working on Monday morning and when we checked out had the nerve to confront one of us for not leaving her a tip. Over all, the place itself was nice, a little run down but ok for cabins. The beds were not good, the linens were in bad shape and the dishes all looked like they came from a thrift store but all of that would not have really mattered if the management and the cleanliness had been better. My advice, RUN the other way.

Reviews.Title: “OK, but not great”
Reviews.Author: lak63
Reviews.Content: This resort was adequate for our needs. The unit was very clean and the appliances are newer and nice. The view of the lake was amazing and there was very good fishing off their dock. Also, the unit had central heat/air - a big plus since it was 100 degrees every day of our stay. Unfortunately there were a couple of downsides that will make me think twice before I stay here again. 1st - the bed was rock hard. I never knew beds this hard existed. VERY uncomfortable. 2nd, the owner was NEVER around. If we had needed anything we had to call, which I really did not want to do. Our porch light was out but since he was never there we never got it fixed. Still, if what you want is a clean place for your family to stay and fish on the lake, this place is adequate.

Reviews.Title: “Another Resort In Branson Gone to Hell!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Donald H
Reviews.Content: Recently stayed at Del Mar Resort, sister to the LakeShore Resort just a block down the road. We have stayed there the past three years.... Shame on us!!! Upon checking in, we rent the same cabins each year, we noticed the same problems expressed the previous year and NONE had been addressed. Broken light fixtures, No screen door, Shower had barely enough pressure to rinse your body off let alone wash yourself. The grass was tall when we arrived and was never cut the whole time we were there (8 days) so just walking down to the dock in the morning required a change of socks and shoes as they were soaked from walking through the dew filled foot long grass. We saw the staff maybe four times we were there and had to buy towels at WalMart so we had clean ones. The dock is in shambles as we've been told for the last three years that it would be fixed. Loose boards everywhere on the dock that my wife tripped on. Refrigerator barely works, microwave had glass plate in it that did not fit so as it rotated while running it clanked and made a god awful noise every time around. Plumbing backed up and we were accused of backing it up. The second to last day we were there the maid was going to clean our rooms as she thought we were checking out until my wife told her we were not checking out until the next day. Then to top it off, we went down to Lakeshore to pay for our stay and were told by Rodney that he did not have our bill ready and he would catch up with us later. That he did..... at 10:00 PM!!!!! We had just arrived home from a show on our last night there and he was at the cabin waiting for us to pay for the room. I don't have a problem with paying for the room but at 10:00.... come on!!!! For $85.00 a night, this is absolutely ridiculous and I will not stay there again and I recommend that anyone avoid this place if you are planning to visit Branson.

Reviews.Title: “The propritor was amazing! Took us to a secret fishing spot and I caught 14 trout!”
Reviews.Author: Kendallsd
Reviews.Content: Great place to stay if your ever in the ozarks. Saved a ton of $$ cooking in the cabin rather than going to eat on the strip. Clean rooms and great prices. I will be back next year!

Reviews.Title: “Trout fishing exellant”
Reviews.Author: tnbland
Reviews.Content: we had a wonderful time we came from Tx to meet another couple from Iowa ,Great place to stay not far from town,trout fishing great off dock,Rodney the owner very nice,came to us everyday to check on us to see if we needed anything Rodney the owner got us tickets for the Dixie Stampede wich i recommend,The trees were changing to fall colors beautyful We will go back and stay at the Resort

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed”
Reviews.Author: FishIL
Reviews.Content: We had stayed at the Lakeshore quite often in the past under the previous management. Andy and Julie (the old owners) were always around, and very friendly. They'd come by or come down to the dock to see how everyone was doing, but with the change in ownership, we were left feeling disappointed. It seems all they wanted out of the resort was an investment. They have raised the prices at the Lakeshore, without much in the way of upgrading the accomodations. They've also purchased another small resort down the street, which are nothing more than bare-bones cabins, but are charging Lakeshore prices. When we arrived, our cabins were dirty, some of them had mouse droppings on the floor and the counters, but when we told the management, they didn't believe us. When the 'handyman', Rodney, came to check it out, he just marched right into our cabin (in the middle of family dinner) without even knocking! The Lakeshore is still a beautiful setting, it just seems it's not being taken care of very well.

Reviews.Title: “Conveniently located near Kanakuk's K-1, K-Kountry, and K-Kauai Kamps.”
Reviews.Author: KansasNeighbor
Reviews.Content: Stayed at LakeShore Resort to visit daughter on her day off while a Kanakuk Kamp counselor. She loved having such a short drive (2 minutes) from Kamp to our cabin. Rented one of the larger cabins. Quiet, simple, roomy, and comfortable. Used the cabin's kitchen for several meals. Charcoal grill outside was handy for grilling chicken and making s'mores. LakeShore Resourt is on Lake Taneycomo and has a dock. Owners were friendly and accommodating with our requests during our 2-night stay. They were extremely helpful in providing advice - such as grocery store, dining out, fastest route to Siver Dollar City.

Reviews.Title: “Very Quiet & Relaxing”
Reviews.Author: signlady_1
Reviews.Content: This was our first time visiting Lakeshore Resort & we were VERY pleased with our decision. The place very clean & very private & comfortable. We were looking for a place that we could bring our 2 dogs with us & they loved it too! The staff was very friendly & accomadating if we had any questions. We will definitely be back again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Family Owned Resort”
Reviews.Author: barb8misbvn
Reviews.Content: I was in Branson, MO and had the wonderful experience of staying at a family owned resort, LakeShore Resorts of Branson. The cabins were marvelous. A employee at the resort, Rodney, showed me the nak of trout fishing, and caught trout galore. They have two resorts with two very nice pools. This trip was just a friend and myself. Next I am going to get the family to have our "family reunion" there. They have tow conference rooms with large equipped kitchens. I think I will go back during fall to view the fall foilage. Maybe Thanksgiving!!!

Reviews.Title: “GREAT EXPERIENCE--NEW MANAGEMENT HAS REALLY TURNED THINGS AROUND!”
Reviews.Author: shessky
Reviews.Content: We go down each June to fish Lake Taneycomo--that's it. We just like to have a quiet place to stay that is clean and accomodating, and Lakeshore Resort is definitely that place! We have been staying there since 2006 and the old owners were, for lack of a better term, crazy. We were looking to find a new place to stay when we found out the old owners sold the place. The new owners were MUCH, MUCH better and were really friendly. They upgraded our room for no charge and were always there to help you or provide you with any service you needed. The new management is definitely turning things around and we will definitely be back because of them. I was very, very pleased with the whole new attitude and feeling projected by the new management.

Reviews.Title: “Favorite Getaway”
Reviews.Author: softball105
Reviews.Content: I go to Branson at least four times a year and would never even consider staying anywhere other than Lakeshore Resort. The staff is amazing and treat you like you're part of the family. My friends and family actually ask if they can go with me when I mention I'm thinking about going up there for the weekend. This last time I just had to get away and have time to myself. The docks are perfect for fishing and if you have a boat (which I hope to get one soon) there is a ramp right on property available for guests to use. The owners were very helpful in providing me with a place for boat rentals and the best shows to go watch. I've already got my third trip of the year scheduled for May and I can't wait! Definately the best location in Branson for just getting away from everything or spending time with the people you care about!

Reviews.Title: “NightMare!!! Run Down Mess - Nee”
Reviews.Author: DisappointedAGAIN08
Reviews.Content: Absolutely terrible. We stayed back in 2004 and it has gotten worse! Can't imagine that but it did. We wouldn't have gone back but they were new owners and said how much work they were putting in it. The dock is gross - garbage and dead fish floating up against it. Playground a mess, torn up ping pong table laying out in yard. Grass not cut. The cabins are a joke. Niece lifted one bed to put her baby bed there and it was soiled with pee and stunk terrible. Owner gave her an empty can of off brand spray and said use this. Carpet was moldy and stunk. Showers took a while before water ran and daughter-in-law had cold showers. They are clueless and just want an investment but forgort someone must work to keep the place up. Feel sorry they are not any smarter than they are!

Reviews.Title: “HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE”
Reviews.Author: MemawL
Reviews.Content: This place was terrible!!! We were promised a room with a double jacuzzi and it did not have it. They let us stay in one that did the first night but we had to move the second day because they said it was rented. Come to find out it was not!!! We had someone knock on our door at 11:30 PM and by the time we got to the door no one was there. I tried to call the emergency numbers listed in the book to see if there was a problem and they had both been disconnected. There was no remote to the TV in the room we had the second night and they made no attempt to try and find us one!!! We attempted to check out before 8 AM on Saturday and found that they have office hours of 8:30 AM until 5:00 PM!!! We stayed here several years ago for our honeymoon and it was great...we won't be back until there is better management.

Reviews.Title: “Very Enjoyable!”
Reviews.Author: stefnemcc
Reviews.Content: My family of five stayed 5 nights in this resort . Other than the change of management ,at the same time as our stay ,there is nothing short of staying for free that could have made our vacation any more enjoyable! The staff is not only friendly, they're also very helpful . Towels, directions, putting our boat in the water& help in loading it back! Good Christian people in charge now -don't know about the old ones-will take good care of you & your family's needs during your stay.

Reviews.Title: “We go every year in April and are always satisfied”
Reviews.Author: Dartherepairman
Reviews.Content: The owners are customer friendly and go out of thier way to make the stay enjoyable

Reviews.Title: “Great, relaxing stay!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Lakeshore during the winter months and it was wonderful! My family and I enjoyed the quiet, relaxing atmosphere of the lake and wonderful wildlife. The fireplace in the room was great and so was the jacuzzi tub. The room was very clean and up-to-date. Needless to say I would definitely recommend this resort to everyone! Thanks for a great vacation!

Reviews.Title: “Poor business ethics”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We had stayed at the resort once before for a reunion (30 family members) and were pleased. Upon leaving, we made reservations for the next year; paid deposits in January when we were billed. One month before we were to go back for another reunion, two of our families were called and told that they had been "bumped" for their fist nights stay but they could book for a night longer if they wanted too. This was entirely unexceptable as they were traveling all the way from Michigan & Wisconcin and everyone else would be leaving the day before they would if they accepted the extra night. When we asked why they had been bumped, no explanation was given. I presume a bigger party was coming in and we didn't matter. Poor business ethics!!!! Not an "I'm sorry or anything!!!!! We won't go back.

Reviews.Title: “A Complete Rip-off”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: What a rip-off. My wife and I booked the hotel and was charged the deposit fee (1 nights stay). Upon arrival, we went to our room and were amazed at how disgusting the room was. No lock on the door, smelled of mildue and wasn't clean. Needless to say, we were forced to stay somewhere else for the remainder of the trip. When we spoke with the owner, we were informed we would still be charged the deposit, then 7 days later were charged another 2 nights stay. I cannot comprehend any of the other reviews listed here. Suffice it so say that, anyone can publish a review. Even the folks who own the hotel. A very, very unsastisfied customer.

HotelInfo.Name: Lakeshore Resort
HotelInfo.Address: 1773 Lakeshore Drive, Branson, MO 65616
